front.title: GMPLS Signalling Extensions for control of B100G OTUCn/ODUCn Network

abstract.t: This document provides extensions to GMPLS signalling to control the B100G OTUCn/ODUCn Network, as a result of the introduction of new beyond 100G OTUCn/ODUCn signals in ITU-T Recommendation G.709 [G.709-2016].
